sentence: Reported issues to Raffles who state that rooms are being renovated and we were allocated one which had not been renovated yet
The only downsides are that it is fairly pricey and the bathrooms could do with some modernisation
Beautiful building just a shame the long bar was closed for renovations and the smaller bar had queues snaking around the building
I wanted to stay at Raffles before it was closed for refurbishment and so was intrigued as to whether I would love it is old fashioned tradition and decor or whether it would be faded glory
Still managed a Singapore sling which was served in billiard room as Long Bar being renovated
We were directed to the Billiard Room as the Long Bar is currently closed for renovations but the place still had lots of atmosphere and looked glamorous
Unfortunately three quarters of the famous hotel is closed for refurbishment but the billiard bar is still open for now
More than half of the Hotel was closed due to renovations which meant you missed much of the hotel ’s charm

When we originally arrived in Singapore we were saddened to find out that the Raffles Hotel was undergoing renovation that was initially thought to be finished in mid 2018 but had been pushed up to 2019
Under reno expected to re open around late 2019
Lovely renovated Tiffin room
Roms tastefully redone 4 poster bed
The newly refurbished Raffles Hotel is immaculate
The restoration architects are to be applauded and commended for the magnificent restoration of the Raffles Hotel building beautifully accomplished
We loved the update and classical look in our bathroom and the experience is always first class
Visiting Singapore for 6 nights and one of the highlights we were looking forward to during our trip was a visit for afternoon tea to the refurbished Raffles Hotel
Looks great after the refurbishment
The new renovation is spectacular
Newly renovated Raffles is a beautifully decorated hotel with spacious accommodations and very good service but quality of staff could be better
Beautifully refurbished hotel with so much character
